games.name: Deep Rock Galactic
games.desc: Deep Rock Galactic is a 1-4 player co-op FPS featuring badass space Dwarves, 100% destructible environments, procedurally-generated caves, and endless hordes of alien monsters.

games.name: Don't Starve Together
games.desc: Don't Starve Together is the standalone multiplayer expansion of the uncompromising survival game Don't Starve.
games.reroll: How about a game that's actually possible

games.name: Risk of Rain
games.desc: Risk of Rain is an action platformer with roguelike elements. With permanent death as a primary feature, players will have to play their best to get as far as possible. Fight on a mysterious planet with randomly spawning enemies and bosses, either alone or with 3 friends in online co-op.
games.reroll: I'd like to move and shoot at the same time

games.name: Left 4 Dead 2
games.desc: Set in the zombie apocalypse, Left 4 Dead 2 (L4D2) is the highly anticipated sequel to the award-winning Left 4 Dead, the #1 co-op game of 2008. This co-operative action horror FPS takes you and your friends through the cities, swamps and cemeteries of the Deep South, from Savannah to New Orleans...

games.name: Risk of Rain 2
games.desc: Escape a chaotic alien planet by fighting through hordes of frenzied monsters – with your friends, or on your own. Combine loot in surprising ways and master each character until you become the havoc you feared upon your first crash landing.

games.name: Stardew Valley
games.desc: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life. Can you learn to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home?

games.name: Tabletop Simulator
games.desc: Tabletop Simulator is the only simulator where you can let your aggression out by flipping the table! There are no rules to follow: just you, a physics sandbox, and your friends. Make your own online board games or play the thousands of community created mods. Unlimited gaming possibilities!

games.name: Barotrauma
games.desc: Barotrauma is a 2D co-op submarine simulator – in space, with survival horror elements. Steer your submarine, give orders, fight monsters, fix leaks, operate machinery, man the guns and craft items, and stay alert: danger in Barotrauma doesn’t announce itself!

games.name: Terraria
games.desc: Dig, fight, explore, build! Nothing is impossible in this action-packed adventure game.

games.name: Starbound
games.desc: You’ve fled your home, only to find yourself lost in space with a damaged ship. Your only option is to beam down to the planet below, repair your ship and set off to explore the universe...
games.reroll: Perhaps a game that isn't striving off its mods

games.name: Garry's Mod
games.desc: Garry's Mod is a physics sandbox. There aren't any predefined aims or goals. We give you the tools and leave you to play.

games.name: Team Fortress 2
games.desc: Nine distinct classes provide a broad range of tactical abilities and personalities. Constantly updated with new game modes, maps, equipment and, most importantly, hats!
